entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
